In England, in the seven days to 29 December, there were 852,850 new confirmed cases (1,508.1 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 22 December, there were 651,856 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 31% (200,994 extra cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 03 January is 11,408,560 (20,174.2 cases per 100,000 population).
